>Machine Features|n|

Beginners will love the ease-of-use features - we've incorporated a range of popular features from the home sewing machine, so it's easy to use right out of the box.

|n||n|

3 stitching modes:
Includes stitch regulation and a special mode for ruler work.

|n||n|

Ruler Mode:
An 8 second delay is programmed, so you can move your ruler without the machine stopping. This mode also provides stitch regulation.

|n||n|

Cruise Mode:
The Cruise mode offers stitch regulation, and gives the quilter control for free motion quilting or stippling with a constant and fluent stitch line from the smooth, regulated stitch. Stitch length and speed is regulated by how fast the machine moves along the quilt top.

|n||n|

Speed Mode
Machine will stitch according to the speed and stitch length set on the setting touchpad. Press the start button to start sewing, and the stop button to stop

column3:
>Features|n|300 DPI Built-in Scanner|n|

Scan virtually anything - a handmade drawing, a magazine clipping, cherished photos, and more - and save to your USB for future use. Or, scan the image to create endless cut designs and save to the machine's memory. Never buy a cartridge again.

Scan an image into memory, then edit on the LCD touch screen display. ScanNCut will create cut lines automatically, then cut the design on your material of choice.

|n||n|840 Built-in Designs, Including Quilt and Applique Patterns|n|

Select one of the 840 built-in designs, edit to your liking, and then have it cut out on your material of choice

|n||n|Fabric Cut|n|

Select a built-in design or one you've scanned in and cut fabric for sewing, quilting and applique. Allows for seam allowance.

|n||n|Direct-to-Cut|n|

Scan the image with the 300 DPI built-in scanner, then directly cut your material with a single pass.

|n||n|Pen Draw|n|

Automatically draw your selected built-in or scanned in design on fabric of your material of choice. For quilters, select the seam allowance to cut out the variety of fabrics you'll be piecing together.

ActivStitchﾙ Technology delivers perfect embroidery on a wide variety of fabrics, with different types of thread.

Place every embroidery design exactly where you want it! Excellent for creating extra-large embroideries.
